config.time-graph-title: Correlation between issues in the 'In Progress' column with associated branches and issues in the 'In Progress' column
Correlation between number of different branches associated to issues in the 'In Progress' column and issues in the 'In Progress' column
Correlation between issues in the 'In Review' column with associated open pull requests and issues in the 'In Review' column
Correlation between issues in the 'Done' column with associated merged pull requests and issues in the 'Done' column

custom.title: Get in progress issues with associated branches
Get in review issues wiht associated open pull requests
Get done issues with associated closed pull requests
Get branches associated to in progress issues

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TP-1: At least 75% of 'In Progress' issues must match creation of a branch.
guarantees.description: When an issue is moved to In Progress, a branch associated to this issue must be created.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TP-2: At least 75% of 'In Progress' issues must have different branches associated.
guarantees.description: When an issue is moved to In Progress, a branch associated to this issue must be created.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TP-3: At least 75% of 'In Review' issues must match creation of a Pull Request.
guarantees.description: When an issue is moved to In Review, a Pull Request associated to that issue must be created.

guarantees.notes:
#### Description
```
TP-4: At least 75% of 'Done' issues must match merge of a Pull Request.
guarantees.description: When an issue is moved to Done, the Pull Request associated to the issue must be merge.
